author: intrepid42
body:
#### PR description:

Fixes crash in GenParticles2HepMCConverter (#28803) by adding fake beam particles for exotic LHE files with only one beam-particle candidate. This was used for NeutrinoGun samples (no beam particles) before.

#### PR validation:

* Processed NanoAod from problematic events (in 10_2_X: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/28856)
* Processed MiniAod events to produce Rivet histograms

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/28876
title: Fix #28803 (GenParticles2HepMC with exotic LHE) 10_6_X
